keyword: calories in a filet mignon 8 oz
title: Calories in an 8 oz Filet Mignon
meta_description: Learn calories in a filet mignon 8 oz, plus protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition facts, and preparation tweaks for this lean steak.
h1: Calories in an 8 oz Filet Mignon
assumptions: Lean beef tenderloin steak, trimmed of visible fat, cooked (broiled or grilled), no added oil, butter, or sauce; 8 oz raw weight post-cooking.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, fat trimming, cooking method, and source; values approximate USDA data. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: An 8 oz cooked filet mignon provides ~406 kcal and ~66 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison; scaled from per-100 g basis (8 oz â‰ˆ 227 g).

tweaks.label: Pan-seared with 1 tsp oil per steak
Untrimmed fat (extra 1 g fat per 100 g)

faqs.q: How many calories in a filet mignon 8 oz?
faqs.a: Approximately 406 kcal for an 8 oz cooked, lean filet mignon.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8 oz filet mignon?

faqs.a: Yes, 0 g carbs per serving, making it keto-friendly.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in filet mignon?
faqs.a: Grilling or broiling keeps it lean; frying or adding fats increases calories by 40+ kcal.

faqs.q: Compare 8 oz filet mignon to other steaks?
faqs.a: Leaner than ribeye (higher fat); similar protein but fewer calories than T-bone.
